_header: Thou holy Mother of God almight
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: ‘Speciosa facta es suavis’: a simple prayer to the Virgin Mary — three quatrains

CantAdd68.First Lines:
Thow holy moder off god almyygthBy special grace off hys
                    duinite…
CantAdd68.Last Lines:
…Off alle blyssyd creatures as holy chyrch techydMore &
                    moste blyssyd I certend ȝow fful suyrMartires & virgynus with al
                    seyntes hyr hath prechydPreysyng hyr qwenys þei ded here besy
                    cuyr
CantAdd68.Editions:
Woodruff,  Charles Eveleigh. 
             A XVth Century Guide Book to the Principal Churches of Rome Compiled c.
                1470 by William Brewyn.
         London: Marshall, 1933: 79.
